title: Accept queue but still decline?
body:
I have been trying to queue for normals, and this keeps happening.
I get queued, I click accept, then it says I declined, and now I have a wait timer! Again...
This has been happening since last bloody patch. 
{{champion:78}}

Edit: I give up trying to play normals for now....... I will just play pokemon.

replies.body: You could be having a network problem that's failing to transition you into champion select from pvp.net.  It's really important to fix this up because consistent declines can result in a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) penalty.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this and have a smooth transition between services.  I hope that helps!

I already tested my connection, it isn't my internet.  I come from a family of computer technicians, looking at my connection was the first thing I did.

When you say you tested your connection, did it include each step of the connection guide?  I admire your legacy and knowledge, but you can still have issues or blocks reaching specific services regardless of how strong your connection is.  I have yet to see a case where this specific issue wasn't a result of a network problem, but there's always a chance of some new issue too.  Let me know.
